entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who sounds almost angry at Tonks. He asks her what kept her and what happened.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who was attacked by Bellatrix. She mentions that she wishes she had killed Bellatrix.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a person who wants Tonks as much as she wants Harry and Remus. She tried to kill Tonks.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person whom Bellatrix wants.

entities.name: remus
entities.description: Remus is a person whom Bellatrix wants.

entities.name: ron's auntie muriel
entities.description: Ron's Auntie Muriel's house is where they went after getting injured.

entities.name: rodolphus
entities.description: Rodolphus is a person who was injured by them.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the owner of Auntie Muriel.

relationships.description: Bellatrix wants Tonks as much as she wants Harry and Remus.
Lupin sounds almost angry at Tonks.
Ron's Auntie Muriel is owned by Ron.
